projects.name: Hexydog
projects.desc: A blockchain project targeting the $250B pet care industry, offering HexyPay (crypto payments for pet goods/services) and an international marketplace for pet products. Presale funding has surpassed $550,000, with staking and a Binance listing planned.

projects.name: BlockchainFX
projects.desc: A multi-chain financial services platform enabling real-time settlements, portfolio management, and analytics for retail and institutional investors. Focuses on cross-chain DeFi participation and scalable, high-volume transactions.

projects.name: Vault AI
projects.desc: A project merging AI with DeFi tools on a native blockchain, aiming to provide advanced decentralized finance infrastructure using artificial intelligence.

projects.desc: A platform for tokenizing real estate and intellectual property, recently raised $14.5M in its $TICS token presale.

projects.desc: A Layer-2 scaling solution for Solana, recently secured $22M in funding and is focused on audit credibility and blockchain scalability.

projects.desc: A blockchain project allocating 50% of tokens to presale, focused on natural language processing and computer vision applications.

projects.desc: A blockchain using a novel Proof of Intelligence consensus, reserving 40% of tokens for early investors and focusing on AI-driven validation.

projects.name: Bitcoin Hyper
projects.desc: A Bitcoin fork reimagined for 2025, combining staking rewards, fast finality, and Solana-level speeds. It is the first Bitcoin Layer-2 to integrate the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM), enabling smart contracts, DeFi, and NFTs on a Bitcoin-backed chain.

projects.name: Remittix
projects.desc: A blockchain-powered solution for cross-border payments, focusing on reducing processing times and fees while connecting with existing fiat gateways. Targets the $750B remittance market with deflationary tokenomics.
